code: import React from'react';import'./items.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Items=function Items(props){var taskList=props.taskList,setActive=props.setActive,editTask=props.editTask,deleteTasks=props.deleteTasks,filterTask=props.filterTask;var displayItems=function displayItems(){if(filterTask==='all'){return taskList;}if(filterTask==='active'){return taskList.filter(function(task){return task.active;});}if(filterTask==='completed'){return taskList.filter(function(task){return!task.active;});}};return displayItems().map(function(task){var pstyle=task.active?null:{textDecoration:"line-through"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:pstyle,onClick:function onClick(){return setActive(task.id);},children:task.body}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Purple",onClick:function onClick(){return editTask(task.id);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-edit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Red",onClick:function onClick(){return deleteTasks('one',task.id);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-trash-alt"})})]})]},task.id);});};export default Items;
